dialogue.text: Mum... you're disappearing right in front of me. I can see through you now.
Your edges are blurring like ink in water and I can't stop it.
Even stars must burn out, Jasmine. My twilight has been coming for so long.
The darkness gathers at my edges, drawing me into that final night.
NO! I won't accept this! Not yet!
Mum, please fight it! I'll rip these pages out, I'll burn this whole damn book if I have to!
Some endings cannot be rewritten, my love. Even with all the fire in your heart.
The shadows lengthen for us all, eventually. Mine are simply reaching for me sooner.
Let's cherish this fading light between us. This beautiful, aching twilight.
...Our twilight. God, it hurts to even say it.
I'll stay with you until the very last glimmer fades, Mum. I promise.
